title: Bitcoin Depot Inc. (NASDAQ:BTM) Sees Significant Decrease in Short Interest
description: Bitcoin Depot Inc. (NASDAQ:BTM - Get Free Report) saw a significant drop in short interest in the month of December. As of December 15th, there was short interest totalling 508,400 shares, a drop of 6.0% from the November 30th total of 541,000 shares. Based on an average trading volume of 1,090,000 shares, the days-to-cover ratio is presently 0.5 days. Currently, 8.0% of the shares of the stock are sold short.
